title: Modeling-Based Learning for the Restoration of Siberian Baroque Churches

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Step-by-step exploration of the restoration process of lost temples through 3D modeling practice using smartphone apps

learning_goals: Learners can explain the key architectural features of 18th-century Siberian Baroque style.
Learners can reconstruct the façade composition of a lost temple with 80% accuracy using smartphone-based modeling tools.
Learners can systematically analyze architectural evolution processes by synthesizing historical documents and visual materials.

resources: Smartphone Mounting Stand and Lighting Equipment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
